activities:
Digital Matrix International Inc provides software and services to manage postal mailing lists.
Digital Matrix acts as a data processor and processes data only at the explicit instruction of its customers. Digital Matrix does not own, control, or direct the use of any data stored and used in connection with its software. Digital Matrix does not transfer the personal data to another party without instructions from the data controller (customer), nor do they use the data in a manner other than for which it was intended. Digital Matrix has security measures in place to protect the data from loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names and addresses, processed online and off-line
recoursemech:
Any disputes unable to be resolved directly with the Privacy Administrator will be handled through the International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a Division of the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
